screeningSummary: Prank caller claiming Bigfoot behind 7-Eleven - reveals friend in gorilla suit
arcNotes: Prank call, reveals it's a friend in a gorilla suit, self-aware humor

lines.text: You're on the air. What's your story?
lines.voiceText: You're on the air. What's your story?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Alright, you're on. What's your story?
lines.voiceText: Alright, you're on. What's your story?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: YOU ARE ON THE AIR! Tell us your story!
lines.voiceText: YOU ARE ON THE AIR! Tell us your story!
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: You're on. What's this about?
lines.voiceText: You're on. What's this about?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: You're on. So?
lines.voiceText: You're on. So?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Oh good, a caller! What's your story?
lines.voiceText: Oh good, a caller! What's your story?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: You're on. State your experience concisely.
lines.voiceText: You're on. State your experience concisely.
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Okay, so this is gonna sound crazy, but my buddy dared me and I've had three beers and... look, I saw Bigfoot behind the 7-Eleven last Tuesday. Right behind the dumpsters.
lines.voiceText: Okay, so this is gonna sound crazy, but my buddy dared me and I've had three beers and... look, I saw Bigfoot behind the 7-Eleven last Tuesday. Right behind the dumpsters.
lines.speaker: caller

lines.text: Behind the convenience store. Doing what exactly?
lines.voiceText: Behind the convenience store. Doing what exactly?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Behind the 7-Eleven... okay, doing what?
lines.voiceText: Behind the 7-Eleven... okay, doing what?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: BEHIND THE 7-ELEVEN?! This is AMAZING! Doing what?!
lines.voiceText: BEHIND THE 7-ELEVEN?! This is AMAZING! Doing what?!
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Behind the convenience store. Let me guess - it was eating a hot dog?
lines.voiceText: Behind the convenience store. Let me guess - it was eating a hot dog?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Behind the 7-Eleven. Fine, what was it doing?
lines.voiceText: Behind the 7-Eleven. Fine, what was it doing?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: BEHIND THE DUMPSTERS! I love this already! What was it DOING?!
lines.voiceText: BEHIND THE DUMPSTERS! I love this already! What was it DOING?!
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Behind the convenience store. Describe the observed behavior and any distinctive characteristics.
lines.voiceText: Behind the convenience store. Describe the observed behavior and any distinctive characteristics.
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Just... standing there. Huge, hairy, looking right at me. Made eye contact, Vern. Then it walked into the parking lot.
lines.voiceText: Just... standing there. Huge, hairy, looking right at me. Made eye contact, Vern. Then it walked into the parking lot.
lines.speaker: caller

lines.text: And?
lines.voiceText: And?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: ...and?
lines.voiceText: ...and?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: AND?! This is INCREDIBLE!
lines.voiceText: AND?! This is INCREDIBLE!
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: And? Let me guess - it drove away in a Honda?
lines.voiceText: And? Let me guess - it drove away in a Honda?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: And?
lines.voiceText: And?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: AND?! What happened next?!
lines.voiceText: AND?! What happened next?!
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Subsequent actions and trajectory.
lines.voiceText: Subsequent actions and trajectory.
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Got in a Honda Civic. My buddy Derek. He had this gorilla suit he'd been saving for Halloween. I can't believe I actually called about this.
lines.voiceText: Got in a Honda Civic. My buddy Derek. He had this gorilla suit he'd been saving for Halloween. I can't believe I actually called about this.
lines.speaker: caller

lines.text: Probably buying beef jerky. Next caller.
lines.voiceText: Probably buying beef jerky. Next caller.
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Right... Derek's gorilla suit. Next.
lines.voiceText: Right... Derek's gorilla suit. Next.
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: DEREK in a GORILLA SUIT buying BEEF JERKY! This is the BEST call of the night!
lines.voiceText: DEREK in a GORILLA SUIT buying BEEF JERKY! This is the BEST call of the night!
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Of course it was Derek. Next caller.
lines.voiceText: Of course it was Derek. Next caller.
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Honda Civic and a gorilla suit. Next.
lines.voiceText: Honda Civic and a gorilla suit. Next.
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: DEREK IN A GORILLA SUIT! I can't believe you called about this but I LOVE it! NEXT!
lines.voiceText: DEREK IN A GORILLA SUIT! I can't believe you called about this but I LOVE it! NEXT!
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Convenience store procurement of snacks. Classic bigfoot behavior. Next caller.
lines.voiceText: Convenience store procurement of snacks. Classic bigfoot behavior. Next caller.
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: *snorts* Okay you got me, great show though Vern. I'm never living this down.
lines.voiceText: *snorts* Okay you got me, great show though Vern. I'm never living this down.
lines.speaker: caller
